scenario.name: UAC
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:[service]@[remote_ip] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=z9hG4bK1ref2n30e800fb4nu741.1 From: <sip:1800@[local_ip]>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 INVITE Contact: <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port];transport=udp> Max-Forwards: 70 Allow: ACK,BYE,CANCEL,INVITE,NOTIFY,REFER,UPDATE,OPTIONS,SUBSCRIBE,INFO Accept: application/sdp Privacy: none User-Agent: SIPp Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=sipp 439157903 439157903 IN IP4 [local_ip] s=SIPp c=IN IP4 [local_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [auto_media_port] RTP/AVP 8 18 101 a=fmtp:18 annexb=no a=rtpmap:101 telephone-event/8000 a=fmtp:101 0-15 b=AS:64 a=sendrecv a=ptime:20

ACK sip:[service]@[remote_ip] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=z9hG4bK1ref2n30e800fb4nu741.2 [last_from:] [last_to:] [last_call-id:] CSeq: 1 ACK Contact: <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port];transport=udp> Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Length: 0

INVITE sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: sipp <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] To: sut <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 2 INVITE Contact: sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Length: 0
